report.paper_summary: This paper introduces a new corpus for offensive text span detection, evaluates some systems on it and look at their usefulness for toxic to non-toxic text conversion.
report.summary_of_strengths: ​Well-designed corpus, experiment, and result analysis for an important task. Also, interesting use of the corpus + systems trained on it to analyze existing systems for toxic to non-toxic text conversion. The paper is clear.
report.summary_of_weaknesses: No weaknesses to me, everything looks good to me!
